text: L6.3. Counting cache hits Given a direct-mapped cache with 8 cache slots, 16-byte blocks, and a main memory that has 12-bit addresses. Calculate the total number of hits if the following addresses are accessed in order. Oxe3d 0x92a The initial configuration of the cache is given below: _Index | Tag | 000 | 00001 11110 10010 00100 10011 01110 00001 01001 integer hits @ Save & Grade Single attempt Ad(ditional attempts available with new variants @
